price: Yeryüzüne ve onun üzerindekilere ancak biz vâris oluruz (her şey gider, biz kalırız) ve onlar ancak bize döndürülürler.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
